## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (e6063a5b8d886a5c9c300ca7c6cd7eca006ea5faaca7e257371cea1529528daf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'huma-contracts-v2' @ 100.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
